K10D0132_H0134:414b-2: cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs
K10D0132_H0134:414b-3: rgyas nas / gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang sems can rnams la ston to //
K10D0132_H0134:414b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-5: tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas chos la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob bo //
K10D0132_H0134:414b-6: lha'i bu khris kyang chos la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:414b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad mi snang bar byas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-9: 'khor de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mthong ngo //
K10D0132_H0134:414b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-12: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub
K10D0132_H0134:414b-13: sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pas mi 'thob
K10D0132_H0134:414b-14: / sa gnyis pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-15: sa gsum pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-16: sa bzhi pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-17: sa lnga pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-18: sa drug pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-19: sa bdun pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-20: sa brgyad pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K10D0132_H0134:414b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pas mi 'thob kyi /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-1: nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pas 'thob bo //
K10D0132_H0134:415a-3: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-5: nam mkha'i khams bzhin du sems bskyed pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-6: sems can thams cad kyi sems la rtog pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-7: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-8: mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-10: gnas ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-11: las rnam par 'byed pa thams cad la las kyi
K10D0132_H0134:415a-12: rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang
K10D0132_H0134:415a-13: / mos pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa mi brjed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-15: khams du ma dag mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-17: ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-18: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mthong zhing shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-20: snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu gyur pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-21: thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pas rnam par lta ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-22: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa la sgrib pa med pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-23: lha'i mig thogs pa med pas mthong ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-24: zag pa zad par bya ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415a-25: spang bar bya ba'i phyir dus gcig tu 'thob pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-0: gzugs med pa'i mnyam @415b pa nyid la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-1: gzugs thams cad ston cing rnam par 'phrul pas rnam par rtse ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-2: sgra skad thams cad brag ca'i sgra dang mnyam pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-3: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-4: gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-5: sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-6: so so ci rigs par chos 'chad pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-7: dus dang dus ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-8: dbang po 'gyur ba shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-9: chos 'chad pa don med pa ma yin pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-10: yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-11: sems can thams cad rab tu gzung ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-12: tshar gcad pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-14: spyod lam ma brtags pa dang; rtog pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-16: yongs su rtog pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:415b-17: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa mnyam pa'i ngos
K10D0132_H0134:415b-18: la 'jug pa shes pa dang; de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0132_H0134:415b-19: thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du skad cig gis
K10D0132_H0134:415b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bshad pa
K10D0132_H0134:415b-22: 'dzin cing mi brjed pa dang; mig yor lta bu'i
K10D0132_H0134:415b-23: lus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par
K10D0132_H0134:415b-24: 'phrul ba dang / theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba ston pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-1: chen po las mi nyams pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-3: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal por go cha sra zhing yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-4: skye ba'i gnas thams cad du ci rigs par byed pa ston pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-5: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-6: nyan thos dang; rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyis gting dpag dka' ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-7: dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa bstan pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-8: chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i gnas shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-9: bskal pa gcig tu bskal pa grangs med pa 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-10: bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa gcig 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-11: zhing thams cad du zhing gcig yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-12: zhing gcig la zhing thams cad ston pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416a-13: skra'i khyon gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis
K10D0132_H0134:416a-14: mi khyab pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa 'jug pa
K10D0132_H0134:416a-15: shes pa dang / sems can gcig gi lus la
K10D0132_H0134:416a-16: sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'du
K10D0132_H0134:416a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-0: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs @416b pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-1: rang gi lus lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-2: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-3: thabs thams cad la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-4: thabs thams cad la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-5: sgra skad gcig byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-6: tshig gcig la brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med par 'chad pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-7: chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-8: chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad bstan pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-10: 'gre pa ma yin pa la mkhas pa shes pas rnam par dpyod pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-12: snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-13: bdud kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-14: thabs chen po la mkhas pas shes rab dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-15: ye shes kyi 'od zer gtong ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-18: yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang;
K10D0132_H0134:416b-19: mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du
K10D0132_H0134:416b-21: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-22: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis kras par rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:416b-23: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-1: thams cad du sems can gyi tha snyad thams cad rtogs pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-2: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos sgrub pa la the tshom med pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-3: skye ba thams cad la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-4: yo byad la dbang thob pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-5: sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du tshim par byed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-7: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin gnas su sems mnyam pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba thams cad thob pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ong zer gtong
K10D0132_H0134:417a-10: ba dang; thams cad mkhyan pa'i rgya mtsho dug can
K10D0132_H0134:417a-11: pa gting dpag dka' ba shes pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-16: tshig bstan pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-18: ma bstan par rang gis bzod pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-20: rin po che lta bu'i sems bskyed bas kun nas
K10D0132_H0134:417a-21: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas mi gos
K10D0132_H0134:417a-22: pa dang / spu gcig gi khung bur chu'i phung po thams cad chud par byed la /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-23: chu na gnas pa'i sems can la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417a-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa'i bsod nams gsog
K10D0132_H0134:417a-25: pa'i snying po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i
K10D0132_H0134:417b-0: @417b sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-1: 'phrul pa la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par
K10D0132_H0134:417b-3: byang chub pa la dbugs 'byin pa thob pa dang
K10D0132_H0134:417b-4: / rang gi lus kyi smon lam gyis sems can
K10D0132_H0134:417b-5: 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rgyun ma bcad pa kun
K10D0132_H0134:417b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-12: longs spyod thams cad kun tu ston pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-13: sems zhi zhing rab tu zhil nye bar zhi ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-14: thos pa tshad med pa 'dzin pa rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-15: thos pa thams cad kyi nan tan rgyun mi gcod pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-16: 'jig rten gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-17: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-18: bskal pa grangs med pa snga dro gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing chos 'chad pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-19: spyod lam thams cad du lkug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-21: rna ba mi gsang ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-24: long ba ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-25: lce'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad khebs bar byed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:417b-26: sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-0: lag na rdo rje 'bum rtag tu phyi bzhin du @418a *//
K10D0132_H0134:418a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rang byung gi
K10D0132_H0134:418a-3: ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du
K10D0132_H0134:418a-4: gyur pa dang / rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems
K10D0132_H0134:418a-5: can rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang
K10D0132_H0134:418a-6: gyur pa dang / / tshe'i tshad bskal pa tshad
K10D0132_H0134:418a-7: med pa bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong du
K10D0132_H0134:418a-9: sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam la sangs
K10D0132_H0134:418a-10: rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston cing 'gro ba shes
K10D0132_H0134:418a-12: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod la ma ston pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-14: zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-15: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-18: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-19: de bya bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la blta ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-21: mchod par bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-28: rjes su dran par byas te /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-31: yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-32: sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'dul
K10D0132_H0134:418a-33: ba'i sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa la
K10D0132_H0134:418a-34: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418a-35: rnam par grol pa ston pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-0: byang chub sems dpa' @418b dag mngal du 'jug pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-4: byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-6: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-8: mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-9: lus 'jig pa'ang ston la byang chub sems dpa'i chos
K10D0132_H0134:418b-10: nyid de'ang mi gtong zhing shin tu phung po med
K10D0132_H0134:418b-11: par yang mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'di ni
K10D0132_H0134:418b-13: dpa' bar 'gor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-14: 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-15: gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-16: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K10D0132_H0134:418b-17: ji ltar nam mkha' dag gyur cing //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-18: rdul gyis gos par mi 'gyur bzhin //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-20: yid ni de ltar sgom par byed //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-21: gang phyir lus can thams cad kyi //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-22: rnam par bcas pa'i sems shes pa //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-23: des na 'di ni bdag nyid che //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-24: de yi mtshan mar rab tu shes //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-25: dpa' 'gro rtogs par khong chud pas //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-26: sems can dag gi dbang po rnams //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-27: rno ba dag dang rtul ba dang //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-28: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-29: lus kun rnam par phye ba dang //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-30: rnam par smin pa sna tshogs dang //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-31: sems can rnams kyi mos pa yang //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-32: bde gshegs sras des shes par 'gyur //
K10D0132_H0134:418b-33: sems can khams ni mkhas pa la //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-2: gang phyir de yis mi rmongs pas //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-4: rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-5: sra ba des ni shes gyur nas //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-6: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gzhan ste //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-8: chos rnams kun gyis lam gyur pa //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-9: thams cad du ni gang 'gro ba'i //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-10: dam pa thub pas bshad pa ste //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-12: de nas de yi sngon gyi gnas //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-14: lha mig dri ma med pa yis //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-16: zag pa dag ni zad byas kyang //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-17: mkhas de mya ngan 'da' mi byed //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-18: gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med pa'i //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-19: mtshan nyid gcig pa mnyam pa shes //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-20: ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po dag /
K10D0132_H0134:419a-21: sna tshogs rnam par rtse ba ltar //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-22: dpa' bo des ni gzugs kun kyang //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-23: ting nge 'dzin gyis rim gyis ston //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-24: sgra kun gyi ni mnyam pa nyid //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-25: brag ca lta bu rnam dag dang //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-26: sems can kun gyi skad rnams kyang //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-27: skad cig tsam gyis des shes so //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-28: gzungs dang ye shes ldan pas na //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-29: skad kyi byed la myur du 'jug sgra dbyangs kyi ni thog ma'i mtha'//
K10D0132_H0134:419a-30: ji lta bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-31: rdul med dran dang blo gros kyis //
K10D0132_H0134:419a-32: thub pa gshegs par myur du 'jug /
K10D0132_H0134:419b-0: legs bshad pas @419b ni sems can la //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-1: sdig pa med pa yid dga' byed //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-2: sems can rnams la ci rigs par //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-3: dgra bcom pa ni chos 'chad de //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-4: mi yi dus dang dus ma yin //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-5: blos ni rnam par rtog par byed //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-6: ji ltar dbang po rnams 'byung ba //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-7: de lta nyid du phyi phyir zhing //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-8: cho ga bzhin du shes gyur nas //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-9: brtan pa dam pa don yod ston //
K10D0132_H0134:419b-10: yang dag mtha' ni phra ba nyid //

K10D0132_H0134:452a-0: de dag kyang lha dang bcas 'jig rten @452a *//

K10D0132_H0134:452a-24: mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub mngon
K10D0132_H0134:452a-25: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /

K10D0132_H0134:452b-10: srid na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir

K10D0132_H0134:452b-13: 'di byang chub thob nas ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur /

K10D0132_H0134:452b-24: nas lha'i bu 'di bla na med pa yang dag

K10D0132_H0134:453b-12: med par grags pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan

K10D0132_H0134:478b-13: pas bshad pa de 'dra ba'i mang du thos pa
K10D0132_H0134:478b-14: dang ldan pa ma yin no //

K10D0132_H0134:478b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos pha rol gyi sgra'i
K10D0132_H0134:478b-22: rjes su song zhing pha rol gyi sgra la mos
K10D0132_H0134:478b-23: pas rnam par grol ba la gtod pa gang su

K10D0132_H0134:478b-27: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi
K10D0132_H0134:478b-28: rgya mtsho thogs pa med cing tshad med la shes
K10D0132_H0134:478b-29: rab dang spobs pa zad mi shes pa dag gi
K10D0132_H0134:478b-30: nang na mang du thos pa'i mchog go zhes ni
K10D0132_H0134:478b-35: dzambu'i gling gi mi dag ni nyi ma dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479a-1: ba rnams kyi las dag kyang byed /
K10D0132_H0134:479a-4: de bzhin du shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin te /

K10D0132_H0134:479a-8: sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu'i mthu nyid du blta'o //
K10D0132_H0134:479a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10D0132_H0134:479a-14: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
K10D0132_H0134:479a-15: khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus kun chub par byed do //
K10D0132_H0134:479a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba
K10D0132_H0134:479a-17: dri ma med pa'i snying po la bka' stsal pa
K10D0132_H0134:479a-19: dge slong kun dga' bos chos kun chub par byas pa ni nyung gi /
K10D0132_H0134:479a-20: gang dag kun chub par ma byas pa ni dpag tu med do //
K10D0132_H0134:479a-22: de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji snyed mngon par rdzogs

K10D0132_H0134:479a-24: ba'i cha 'am / bye ba stong gi cha'am /
K10D0132_H0134:479a-25: bye ba brgya stong gi cha'i cha shas kyang ngas ma bshad do //
K10D0132_H0134:479a-26: ngas gang bshad pa de las bye ba brgya stong
K10D0132_H0134:479a-27: gi cha shas kyang dge slong kun dga' bos ma
K10D0132_H0134:479a-29: nga ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa'i brgya byin dang /

K10D0132_H0134:479b-5: dris pa rnam par phye ba bshad pa dang //
K10D0132_H0134:479b-7: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-8: lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-9: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-10: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /

K10D0132_H0134:479b-13: skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-14: shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /

K10D0132_H0134:479b-16: gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad pa dang /

K10D0132_H0134:479b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa bshad pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-21: 'khor ba smad pa bshad pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-22: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon bshad pa 'chad par byed na /
K10D0132_H0134:479b-24: chos bshad pa de las rgya cher rnam par dbye
K10D0132_H0134:479b-25: ba ni dzambu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul

K10D0132_H0134:479b-33: de la dge slong kun dga' bos ni nyung zad cig kun chub par byas su zad kyi /
K10D0132_H0134:480a-0: @480a *// gang dag kun chub par ma byas pa dag ni dpag tu med do //
K10D0132_H0134:480a-1: de nas lha'i bu zla ba dri ma med pa'i
K10D0132_H0134:480a-2: snying pos rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
K10D0132_H0134:480a-3: gdugs 'bum bcom ldan 'das la phul nas /

K10D0132_H0134:480a-5: sems can gdugs de dag gis ji snyed yog pa
K10D0132_H0134:480a-6: de dag thams cad kyi lus kyang gser gyi kha
K10D0132_H0134:480a-7: dog tu snang bar gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:480a-8: de nas lha'i bu des gdugs de dag bcom ldan
K10D0132_H0134:480a-9: 'das la phul nas 'di skad kyi tshig smras so
K10D0132_H0134:480a-11: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams
K10D0132_H0134:480a-12: cad ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bshad pa
K10D0132_H0134:480a-13: dang / ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
K10D0132_H0134:480a-14: dran pas chos 'dzin pa de lta bu de 'dra
K10D0132_H0134:480a-16: chos 'chad pa dang ldan par gyur cig /

K10D0132_H0134:480a-25: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to
K10D0132_H0134:480a-26: // gtam 'di brjod pa'i tshe 'khor de nas byang
K10D0132_H0134:480b-0: chub sems dpa'i @480b theg pa pa'i srog chags nyis
K10D0132_H0134:480b-1: brgya sems zhum par gyur nas /

K10D0132_H0134:480b-6: su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya gor ma chag
K10D0132_H0134:480b-7: go / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

K10D0132_H0134:480b-12: sems dpa' sems zhum pa nyis brgya po de dag

K10D0132_H0134:481b-20: rten gyi don mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las
K10D0132_H0134:481b-21: 'das so // de yongs su mya ngan 'das nas
K10D0132_H0134:481b-22: dam pa'i chos lo 'bum du gnas par gyur to

K10D0132_H0134:481b-30: te / sems can de dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa sha stag go /

K10D0132_H0134:482a-3: dag gis yon dbul bar bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas

K10D0132_H0134:503b-15: de'i tshe na mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum tshang bar gyur te /
K10D0132_H0134:503b-16: mtshang bar 'ga' yang 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med do //
K10D0132_H0134:503b-18: grong khyer 'byung ba med ces bya ba der rgyal
K10D0132_H0134:503b-19: po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig byung
K10D0132_H0134:503b-21: rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de la bu stong yod par gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:503b-24: rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba bu
K10D0132_H0134:503b-25: stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
K10D0132_H0134:503b-26: gshegs pa chos ta la la'i sgron mnyan thos kyi
K10D0132_H0134:503b-27: dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang /
K10D0132_H0134:503b-31: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:503b-32: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bkur sti byas par gyur /
K10D0132_H0134:504a-3: mchod pa byas pa gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:504a-5: de nas rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba bu stong
K10D0132_H0134:504a-6: dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
K10D0132_H0134:504a-7: pa chos ta la la'i sgron ma la chos kyi
K10D0132_H0134:504a-8: rnam grangs 'di kun zhus par gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:504a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam
K10D0132_H0134:504a-10: pa mkhyen nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par
K10D0132_H0134:504a-11: gyur te / thos ma thag tu rgyal po rnam
K10D0132_H0134:504a-12: par rgyal ba de bu stong dang lhan cig tu
K10D0132_H0134:504a-14: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:504a-16: de lta bas na da ltar ram /
K10D0132_H0134:504a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa 'das kyang rung ste /
K10D0132_H0134:504a-19: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la spobs pa rgyun
K10D0132_H0134:504a-20: mi 'chad cing spobs pa thogs pa med pa 'di
K10D0132_H0134:504a-23: 'di 'dra ba'i gnas kyi chos la brtson par bya /
K10D0132_H0134:504a-25: chos kyi tshig zab mo 'di lta bu gzung bar bya'o;/
K10D0132_H0134:504a-28: chos zab mo'i rnam grangs 'di lta bu kun chub par byas nas gzhan la'ang bstan par bya'o //
K10D0132_H0134:504a-29: chos thams cad la ser sna med par bya'o //
K10D0132_H0134:504a-30: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504a-31: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0132_H0134:504a-32: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi don
K10D0132_H0134:504b-0: @504b gyi slad du ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i
K10D0132_H0134:504b-1: dus na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe la chos
K10D0132_H0134:504b-2: kyi rnam grangs 'di slar yang spyod par 'gyur bar
K10D0132_H0134:504b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
K10D0132_H0134:504b-5: gyur pa'i gsol pa btab pa mkhyen nas chos kyi
K10D0132_H0134:504b-6: rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so //
K10D0132_H0134:504b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0132_H0134:504b-8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0132_H0134:504b-10: chos la bzod pas 'dul ba dag bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0132_H0134:504b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-14: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-15: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-16: de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-17: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-18: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-22: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0132_H0134:504b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0132_H0134:504b-24: 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0132_H0134:505a-2: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ratna rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K10D0132_H0134:505a-3: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos lags so //
